parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name to identify the connection

parameter.name: accountName
parameter.description: The name of the azure storage account.

parameter.name: accountKey
parameter.description: The access key for the storage account.

parameter.name: defaultEndpointsProtocol
parameter.description: The protocol (http or https) of the azure storage account.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.description: The client ID of the application.

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.description: The client secret of the application.

parameter.name: tenantId
